Name: Union
About the game: Union is a minimal puzzle game about connecting shapes. Minimalist experience, no tutorials, timers or scores Handcrafted levels Immersive dynamic sounds Day/Night modes Unique generative soundtrack Audio made by Diego J. Pinto
